ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot add "empty" order note (validation required)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: beta 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: Edit order 3 Go through => order notes click on **Add order note** without add note. It gives one alert like 'Failed to add order note.' It throw exception like **The property 'Id' on entity type 'OrderNote' has a temporary value while attempting to change the entity's state to 'Unchanged'. Either set a permanent value explicitly or ensure that the database is configured to generate values for this property.** After I checked at order note table. I found that note field was not null. To conclude,It should display message like **please enter note**.
